roleset.name: not reacting to treatment/stimulus

example.name: arg0
example.text: Two occasions in April , on April 7 and April 15 , there was a question of possible stroke / TIA where-1 he was not able to move is left arm and leg and was unresponsive [*-1].

roleset.note: UNRESPONSIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia by medi-tmprl1to8. relation to 'respond.01'. (from unresponsive.01-j)
